content.text: I used to be a painter, but now I'm a housekeeper.
That's cool. I love painting, too!
I used to be pretty, but time hasn't been kind to me.
That's okay. I'm sure you're still pretty!
I fantasize about taking over the world.
That's a cool fantasy. I like to dream about going to Disney World every year.
I love Disney World too! I used to go there all the time when I was a kid.
I've been going every year since I was a little kid.
That's awesome! I bet you've seen a lot of cool things there.
Yeah, I have. I've seen all the rides and shows. I even got to meet Mickey Mouse once.
That's amazing! I've never met Mickey Mouse.
You have to go to Disney World sometime. It's a lot of fun.
I will. I've been wanting to go for a long time.
You won't regret it. It's the happiest place on Earth!
I'm sure it is. Thanks for talking to me, (user 2 name).
No problem, (user 1 name). It was nice talking to you too.
